title: Online English Communication Competency Enhancement Program Applying Genette’s Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary proficiency
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing practical English education for job preparation. Learners access Zoom and LMS (Learning Management System) via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize business-situation-specific English expressions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can deliver logical presentations in the target language (English) for 15+ minutes in online discussions.
Learners can establish self-directed language learning plans by applying Gagné’s nine-step instructional process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
